entry.title: Failed to connect to a master node at localhost:27017
entry.content:
Everytime my server looses power, Mongo has trouble restarting. These commands fixes the problem.

bash sudo rm /var/lib/mongodb/mongod.lock

bash sudo -u mongodb mongod -f /etc/mongodb.conf --repair sudo service mongodb restart
